body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to us. My name is Andrew Martinez and I'm with Quality Cars Inc. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Marie. To assist you better, could you please provide me with your phone number, but spell out the digits?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's seven seven three, four five six, eight nine zero one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Marie. Additionally, may I have your email address, but spell it out for me?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's m a r i e dot s a n d e r s at g m a i l dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing your details, Marie. Is there anything else you'd like to share or discuss with me today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I'm feeling frustrated about the quality of the product I received from your dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern, Marie. Thank you for sharing that with me. We'll work to address this issue promptly.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you once again for your time and for contacting us today, Marie. We appreciate your patience as we work on resolving this matter. Have a great day.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you for your help. Goodbye.
